titleStmt.title: Three partes of Salomon his Song of Songs, expounded The first part printed before: but now re-printed and enlarged. The second and third partes neuer printed before. All which parts are here expounded and applied for the readers good. By Henoch Clapham.
Bible. O.T. Song of Solomon. English. Clapham.
titleStmt.author: Clapham, Henoch.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Valentine Sims for Edmund Mutton dwelling in Pater-noster-Row at the signe of the Huntes-man,

notesStmt.note: Parts 2 and 3 each have separate dated title page, pagination and register are continuous.
T1 is cancel with duplicate setting; T1r begins with "is" and last line ends either "ther-" or "there". Original T1 begins: "maister".
Reproduction of the original in the Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.). Library.

place.placeName: Pater-noster-Row at the signe of the Huntes-man
